topicSummary: Balanitis is inflammation of the glans penis and often the foreskin. It can be acute, chronic, or recurrent.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Adverse effects updated within prescribing information - metronidazole.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in January 2018 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of this topic. The topic has undergone minor restructuring. A section on Complications has been added to the Background information section. A section on Differential diagnosis has been added to the Diagnosis section. The management recommendations have been updated in line with the current literature. The Prescribing Information section has been updated and expanded in line with current CKS style.
